endpoints.description: Retrieve the details of all employees managed within the system including their skills and availability.
Fetch the list of active and planned projects along with relevant resource requirements.
Submit a new project along with its workforce and skill requirements.
Update the information associated with a specific employee, such as skills or assigned projects.
Remove a specific project from the system, releasing assigned resources for reallocation.
Retrieve the current and upcoming shift schedules for all employees.
Request a resource allocation recommendation based on project inputs and available staff.
Fetch the availability status of employees over a specified timeframe.
Modify the shift scheduling of an employee to optimize resource distribution.
Generate detailed reports on resource allocation efficiency and project workforce adequacy.
